org.prolog4j
Class AbstractProverFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.prolog4j.AbstractProverFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProverFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
JLogProverFactory, JTrologProverFactory, SWIPrologProverFactory, TuPrologProverFactory
public abstract class AbstractProverFactory
extends Object
implements IProverFactory

Abstract implementation of the IProverFactory interface. It creates a prover with a given name on demand, at the first time when requested, and then stores it in a map. If a prover with the same name is requested again, then it returns that from the map.

Method Detail

getProver

public Prover getProver(String name)
Description copied from interface: IProverFactory
Returns an appropriate Prover instance as specified by the name parameter. It provides the same prover instance for the same name whenever you call it.

Null-valued name arguments are considered invalid.

Specified by:
getProver in interface IProverFactory
Parameters:
name - the name of the prover to return
Returns:
a prover instance with the specified name

getConversionPolicy

public ConversionPolicy getConversionPolicy()
Description copied from interface: IProverFactory
Returns the conversion policy used by provers at default. The modification of this policy effects all provers. The policy can also be customized on a per prover base by getting their own policy.

Specified by:
getConversionPolicy in interface IProverFactory
Returns:
the default conversion policy
